title: Foodie
description: Developed a comprehensive food ordering and restaurant discovery platform featuring real-time restaurant search, menu browsing, user authentication, and cart management. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless food ordering experience with ratings, reviews, and delivery tracking.

title: Blog Verse
description: Architected a full-stack blogging system with React frontend and Hono backend, featuring secure user authentication, persistent sessions, and PostgreSQL integration via Prisma ORM for scalable content management.

title: Portfolio
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and achievements, enhancing my online presence.
